function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Text mentions the spread of contagious diseases in built environments at all scales.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases can lead to public health crises and high mortality rates.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and cleaning protocols, promoting vaccination, and enforcing social distancing measures can mitigate the risk.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C sterilization, and contactless technology for public spaces can help reduce the spread of diseases.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in communal living spaces are at risk.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government bodies, building owners, and facility managers can implement the mitigation measures."}]}
